description:
When review patch: https://review.openstack.org/64099 I realized that, when we instantiate webob.exc.HTTP* class, we should use explanation instead of detail, or the http response will get message of default explanation instead what we expect.

Besides, there are some i18n problem in those message, will be fixed in the same time. Other i18n problem will not be solved in this bug fix
title: incorrect kwargs detail for webob.exc.HTTP*

comments.content:
When review patch: https://review.openstack.org/64099 I realized that, when we instantiate webob.exc.HTTP* class, we should use explanation instead of detail, or the http response will get message of default explanation instead what we expect.

Besides, there are some i18n problem in those message, will be fixed in the same time. Other i18n problem will not be solved in this bug fix
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~aji-zqfan

comments.content:
Seems Haiwei Xu wants to fix it one by one:
https://bugs.launchpad.net/nova/+bug/1283876
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~aji-zqfan

comments.content: These all appear to be fixed in Nova now
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~cyeoh-0

comments.content:

If the bug is still valid, then update the bug status.
